TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MetadataTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class MetadataTypeAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class MetadataTypeAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定與資料模型類別產生關聯的中繼資料類別。

span.span: Specifies the metadata class to associate with a data model class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您將類別相關聯的資料模型部分類別。The attribute enables you to associate a class with a data-model partial class. 在這個相關聯的類別中，您會提供不是資料模型中的其他中繼資料資訊。In this associated class you provide additional metadata information that is not in the data model. 例如，在相關聯的類別可以套用屬性至資料欄位。For example, in the associated class you can apply the attribute to a data field. 這會強制執行即使這個條件約束不需要依資料庫結構描述，為欄位提供值。This enforces that a value is provided for the field even if this constraint is not required by the database schema. 您使用屬性，如下所示：You use the attribute as follows: - 在您的應用程式中，建立的檔案，您可以在其中建立您想要修改的資料模型部分類別。In your application, create a file in which you create the data-model partial class that you want to modify. - 建立相關聯的中繼資料類別。Create the associated metadata class. - 套用屬性加入該部分的實體類別，指定相關聯的類別。Apply the attribute to the partial entity class, specifying the associated class. 當您套用這個屬性時，您必須遵守下列使用條件約束：When you apply this attribute, you must adhere to the following usage constraints: - 屬性只能套用至類別。The attribute can only be applied to a class. - 屬性不能由衍生類別繼承。The attribute cannot be inherited by derived classes. - 屬性可以套用一次。The attribute can be applied only one time. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用實體部分類別相關聯的中繼資料類別。The following example shows how to use the to associate a metadata class with an entity partial class. 範例會在套用屬性至資料欄位，以示範如何提供相關聯的中繼資料類別中的其他資訊。The example applies the attribute to a data field to show how to provide additional information in the associated metadata class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MetadataTypeAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MetadataTypeAttribute/CS/Customer.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MetadataTypeAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MetadataTypeAttribute/VB/Customer.vb#1)]

param.name: metadataClassType
param.span: 要參考的中繼資料類別。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得與資料模型部分類別相關聯的中繼資料類別。

span.span: Gets the metadata class that is associated with a data-model partial class.

value.span: 表示中繼資料類別的型別值。

span.span: The type value that represents the metadata class.
